title: Audit Records of Processing Activities (RoPA)
description: A compliance auditor reviews the company's RoPA document for GDPR compliance.

tasks.description: Obtain the company's official RoPA document.
Select a new business process and verify that it has been added to the RoPA.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that a new marketing analytics process that uses customer data has not yet been documented in the RoPA.

tasks.description: For a sample of entries in the RoPA, verify that the stated data retention period is accurate and consistent with the data retention policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms the accuracy of the sampled RoPA entries.
